# utils-merge

Merges the properties from a source object into a destination object.

## Install

    $ npm install utils-merge

## Usage

```javascript
var a = { foo: 'bar' }
  , b = { bar: 'baz' };

merge(a, b***REMOVED***;
// => { foo: 'bar', bar: 'baz' }
```

## Tests

    $ npm install
    $ npm test
